As we wrap up a busy few weeks in Washington, I want to hear from you! So join me TOMORROW, March 1, at 12:15 p.m. MT for a Facebook Live town hall! #mtpol

Yesterday, a great Montanan was laid to rest. Jason Baker was a firefighter for 16 years with Great Falls Fire and Rescue. To his wife Jill, his children Peyton & Porter, and all of his friends & family across the state: we are forever proud of Jason & grateful for his service. pic.twitter.com/VwEvQ0WatN

Shining a light on Big Pharma's backroom dealings is an important first step towards accountability. Prescription drug costs are too high. Families deserve transparency & change. Folks shouldn't have to go into debt to get the medications they need. That's why I helped reintroduce the SPIKE Act, to shine more light on the pharmaceutical industry’s backroom dealings and hold them accountable for massive price hikes. #mtpol @ABCFOXMT https://www.abcfoxmontana.com/regional/senator-tester-intorduces-spike-act-requiring-pharmaceutical-companies-to-explain/article_b8beb108-34fb-5d25-831f-473c811e8c56.html …

Stopped by @kettlehousebrew on Saturday to have a beer and talk about my bill to cut taxes for small, local brewers and distillers, giving them the opportunity to expand, employ more people, and have more fun. 🍻#mtpol

Microbreweries & microdistilleries have been an incredible success story in Montana. That's why I helped reintroduce a bill to help them keep growing, succeeding, and having fun. Discussing the #MMIW crisis tonight with my #SOTU guest Briana Lamb. I first met Briana at a roundtable last August. She told me about the rate of missing indigenous women in MT & I vowed to get answers and bring more attention to the issue. WATCH MORE:  https://sen.gov/JJ57  pic.twitter.com/v4dsCyTnrv

Very excited to be bringing Missoula’s own Briana Lamb to the #SOTU tomorrow night. Briana has been an invaluable source of insight & inspiration as we’ve worked to start a national conversation about the #MMIW epidemic. #mtpol https://kpax.com/news/missoula-county/2019/02/03/tester-bringing-missoula-mmiw-advocate-to-state-of-the-union/ …
